goals.title: Blight of the Grain
goals.flavor: Fields once green now stand in gray silence. A spreading rot climbs each stalk, and granaries begin to stink of decay. If unhalted, hunger will carve the city hollow.

goals.title: Locust Tempest
goals.flavor: At dusk the sky churns like living smoke. Swarms descend, stripping leaf and bark alike. Panic spreads as seed reserves dwindle and livestock weaken.

goals.title: River Drought
goals.flavor: The riverbed cracks under a sun that will not yield. Irrigation channels lie dusty, fishermen trade nets for prayer. Without water the city’s pulse falters.

goals.title: Encircling Army
goals.flavor: Foreign banners sprout on every horizon. Supply lines are cut and fear breeds rumor inside the walls. A drawn-out siege threatens famine and revolt.

goals.title: Saboteur Network
goals.flavor: Night after night small fires blossom in storehouses. Tools vanish, guard rosters forged. An unseen hand erodes the city from within.

goals.title: Border Skirmishes
goals.flavor: Outlying farms report raids; roads grow unsafe. Trade caravans delay departures and militia stretch thin. Unchecked, raids will escalate to full invasion.

goals.title: Red Lung Plague
goals.flavor: Coughs echo through alleys, crimson flecks staining cloth. Clinics overflow while healers ration dwindling herbs. Left unchecked, the city’s workforce and hope will both collapse.

goals.title: Well Rot
goals.flavor: A slick film coats public wells; water tastes of metal and mold. Illness spreads in waves of fever and delirium. Purity must be restored or thirst will claim more lives than disease.

goals.title: Infant Mortality Surge
goals.flavor: Cradles lie empty in mourning households. Midwives weep at patterns they cannot break. The future generation flickers, threatening long-term decline.

goals.title: Market Panic
goals.flavor: Coin stalls as traders hoard goods. Prices spiral; bartering replaces contracts. If stability isn’t restored, famine and unrest will follow.

goals.title: Guild Strike
goals.flavor: Craft guilds lock workshops, demanding concessions. Construction halts; repairs backlog. Infrastructure decay accelerates under political strain.

goals.title: Caravan Disappearances
goals.flavor: Supply caravans vanish along trade arteries. Rumors of organized brigands or arcane storms spread. Resource scarcity looms.

goals.title: Bribed Magistrates
goals.flavor: Court rulings skew toward the wealthy; evidence disappears. Commoners stage vigils outside shuttered halls. Legitimacy fractures; vigilantism stirs.

goals.title: Cult Infiltration
goals.flavor: A clandestine cult embeds agents in record archives and guard posts. Edicts warp subtly; missing persons reports rise. Faith and order both erode.

goals.title: Rioting District
goals.flavor: A working-class district erupts nightly: smashed stalls, torch-lit marches. Authorities hesitate, fearing escalation. Commerce and safety plummet.

goals.title: Temple Desecration
goals.flavor: Central shrine defaced; sacred relic cracked. Pilgrims turn away, donations crash. If sanctity isn’t restored, broader despair may ignite other crises.

goals.title: Prophetic Panic
goals.flavor: A cascade of contradictory prophecies floods the streets: flame, flood, eclipse. Citizens freeze in indecision. Order frays under metaphysical dread.

goals.title: Silent Altars
goals.flavor: Priests report unanswered rituals; incense gutters without breeze. Rumors of divine abandonment spread. Devotion metrics plummet.

goals.title: Great Flood
goals.flavor: Black clouds stack like fortress walls. The river swells overnight, overtopping levees. Districts vanish beneath churning water; disease risk spikes.

goals.title: Earth Tremor Chain
goals.flavor: Minor quakes rattle crockery, escalating to fractures in paved roads. Engineers fear a major rupture that could shatter aqueducts and granaries.

goals.title: Ashfall Veil
goals.flavor: Distant mountain belches a gray plume. Fine ash drifts over rooftops, clogging cisterns and lungs. Daylight dims; crop photos decline.

goals.title: Whispering Fog
goals.flavor: A sentient mist coils through streets at night. Those who wander within emerge disoriented, some never return. Navigation and commerce stall.

goals.title: Time Fractures
goals.flavor: Clock towers desynchronize; some workshops report hours vanishing. Crop cycles misalign and contract deadlines collapse into confusion.

goals.title: Subterranean Serpent Stirring
goals.flavor: Low rumbles pulse beneath foundations. Scholars argue a colossal serpent spirit turns in uneasy dreams. Cracks spider through lower cisterns.

goal.notes: Each goal represents a disaster scenario used for disaster goal generation.
